fields.title: Honeypot E-Commerce
fields.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform for an artisan cosmetics brand, built with Django.
fields.client_challenge: The goal for 'Honeypot' was to design and build a complete e-commerce solution for a fictional artisan cosmetics brand. The key challenge was to create a secure, user-friendly online store that reflects the brand's premium quality and provides a seamless path from product discovery to purchase.
fields.my_solution: I built a full-stack web application from the ground up using Django. It features a complete shopping cart system, secure user authentication, product management, and an admin panel for order tracking. The design is clean, responsive, and focused on showcasing the products beautifully.
fields.the_result: The result is a production-ready e-commerce platform designed to drive sales. Key features include Stripe integration for secure payments, a product review system to build social proof, and an intuitive checkout process designed to maximize conversions for a small business.

fields.title: Time[less] Travel Blog
fields.description: An elegant and engaging blog platform and content management system for a travel writer.
fields.client_challenge: The objective for 'Timeless Travel' was to create an elegant and engaging blog platform for a fictional travel writer. The goal was to build a content-focused site that empowers the author to easily share stories and photos, while providing a smooth and enjoyable reading experience for their audience.
fields.my_solution: This is a robust Content Management System (CMS) built with Django. It allows the site administrator to perform full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on blog posts without needing to touch any code. I focused on a clean, legible design that prioritizes the content and imagery.
fields.the_result: The platform empowers a writer to manage their own content and build a community. Key outcomes include an easy-to-use post editor, a comment system for reader engagement, and a paginated, organized layout that encourages visitors to explore more contentâ€”all essential features for a professional blogger looking to grow their audience.
